input_dir = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', 'convert_2_magic', 'sufar_asc_magic'
    )
infile = 'sufar4-asc_magic_example.txt'
program_ran, error_message = convert.sufar4(infile, input_dir_path=
    input_dir, sample_naming_con='4', data_model_num=2)
self.assertFalse(program_ran)
self.assertEqual(error_message,
    'option [4] must be in form 4-Z where Z is an integer')
